review.headline_rewrite: What to expect from Indian stock market in September amid Trump's tariff tension?
bullets: Indian stock market: Indian indices - Sensex and Nifty 50 - started the month of September on a higher note, supported by stronger-than-expected June-quarter

item.title: Godrej Consumer must deliver on growth in FY26 to sustain stock valuation

review.headline_rewrite: Godrej Consumer must deliver on growth in FY26 to sustain stock valuation
bullets: Godrej Consumer must deliver on growth in FY26 to sustain stock valuation As the management sets ambitious targets for FY26 amidst palm oil inflation
Godrej Consumer Products Ltd’s (GCPL) base coming off a soft FY25 only raises the stakes for this year.
Consolidated revenue grew 2%, margins contracted and the soaps portfolio in the personal care segment remained a drag.

item.title: Semiconductor firm Tessolve raises $150 million from TPG Growth

review.headline_rewrite: Semiconductor firm Tessolve raises $150 million from TPG Growth
bullets: Over the years, Tessolve has scaled its revenues from $25 million in FY16 to over $150 million in FY25.
